name: Project Neon
description:
Project Neon is an action packed experience based on Super Crate Box that tests your spatial awareness and ability to adapt. Increase your highscore by collecting the crates dropped by destroying the colorful, but aggressive enemies, and learn how  to use the varying weapons to their highest potential.

If you played the game and want to share your feedback, feel free to comment on this page and / or fill in our questionnaire at: https://forms.office.com/r/yaAreuC5nD.
Thanks in advance!

Weapons

  • Plasma Rifle : Michael
  • Dash Attack : Bart
  • Tesla Gun : Jesse van
  • Laser Beam : Joost
  • Katana : Maksim
  • Scatter Launcher : Wesley

Enemies

  • Absorber : Bart
  • Lazer Crystal : Michael
  • Spider : Jesse
  • Accelerator : Joost
  • Miner : Maksim
  • Swarm Factory : Wesley

Other Features

  • Visuals : Bart & Joost
  • Debug Menu : Wesley
  • Practice Game Mode : Wesley
  • HUD : Wesley
  • Menus : Wesley
  • Highscore (Save & Load) : Wesley
